attributes.action: Disallowing Whipping to be used by political leaders
attributes.additional_details:
During the debate on the EU referendum Whips where used to prevent MPs from having a free and Democratic vote, I find this unconstitutional and very close to being in my view tyranical. facing threats of having to resign, I commend those that spoke up, made sense and voted yes, Nobody should have the right to surpress anothers vote, or there is no point having a vote at all.

I would like this in future to made against the law and entitle all mps to vote with there heart and for the people of this country.

rejection.details: Whipping is a matter for political parties and not HM Government.
